title: Team Aiming Challenger LF Players
body:
Trialling players for a team that the goals are:
 1-Get challenger
2- Earn sponsorship
3- Push for OCS.

Must be D5+ and must have r5 experience.
My main is  Rico and in 2 master teams.

Post your role, proffered champions on this thread and I will add you since my FL is maxed.

Thank you!

replies.body:
IGN: ECV Esardo
Role: Mid
Champs: Zed, Ahri, Ori, Azir,

IGN: IF Stronk
Role: Support
Champs: Thresh, Janna, Bard, Braum, Blitzcrank, Lulu
